name: Aero Masters:Cadet
description:
you and your platoon are in enemy territory.
Destroy the enemies blocking your path to victory.
If you want more score, you have to shoot at the enemies more than your fellows.

Aero Masters is an epic 360-degree shooter game only for the IOS.
Experience the evolutionary 2D shooter game.

Aero Masters is a 2D top view shooter game that utilizes the 3D aerial shooter game system.
This game is the Next generation of shooter game that can play awesome dog-fighting using simple control.

-3 types of controls : Joy-pad, Auto tilt, Manual tilt
-Formation system : cooperate and compete with our pilots for a high score
-swipe your combat and use various flying skills : snap roll, booster, slow down
-3 different types of playable fighter pilots; Each utilizes a unique missile type.
-10 different types of playable combat planes
-24 types of enemies including boss planes
-100 campaign stage
-Survival Mode
-Game center supports - Online leaderboards and achievements
-Excellent particle effects
-Great A.I.
